title: Cryptos To Potentially Hit the Jackpot: Logarithmic Finance, Polygon, and Terra - Mint
content: Cryptos To Potentially Hit the Jackpot: Logarithmic Finance, Polygon, and Terra  Mint
description: Logarithmic Finance (LOG) is a secure and non-custodial coin, and it will enter the Metaverse to allow its investors to be able to accept payments and swap their NFTS.
